mean_cn: adj. 一次性的，可任意处理的，用完即丢的
mean_en: made to be used once or only a few times :made to be thrown away after one use or several uses
word_etyma: dispos处置 + able形容词后缀，可...的 → disposable 可处置的
sentence: The disposable coffee cup was designed to protect hands from being burned.
sentence_trans: 这个一次性咖啡杯被设计来保护手不被烫伤。
